subject: Simsonn Plus X Racing Simulation Pedal with Haptic Reactor - to Australia.
description_text:

conversations.body_text: Hi Max Taylor,  The PlusX pedals do not include the VAM or VAM Pro motor by default — it needs to be purchased separately. Here is the purchase link for your reference:      https://www.simsonn.com/products/simsonn-vam-pedals-haptic-reactor?variant=51351053500730

Hi Simsonn,

Noted on the VAM / VAM pro,

for link below:

https://www.simsonn.com/products/simsonn-pro-plus-x-pedals

looking to purchase those and do not want to end up with 2 sets of 3 pedals.

Are there 1, 2 or 3 pedals in there? Sorry I just couldn't find this info
on the site. In the picture there are 3 pedals yet in the dimensions tab,
those are for the springs? and the plate? It isn't clear anywhere exactly
how many pedals.

Many thanks in advance!



Many thanks in advance.
